name: A Finished Game
description:
Walk and Jump in this platformer that I was too lazy to finish. 

Made for a game jam that lasted a month but I started a week and a half before the deadline. 

I'm being passive aggressive here because I am mad at myself for not getting the game to a state I was happy with and procrastinating until I didn't have a choice. 

Anyways, I'm sure there is something to enjoy here.

Here is the credit I used because I was too lazy to create my own:

Good (Blissful) Morning, Alice! by Skye Jordan (c) copyright 2022 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/SkyeJordan/65600
